UK's Cameron raises Red Sea, human rights issues with Chinese counterpartBritish Foreign Minister David Cameron met his Chinese counterpart Wang Yi at the Munich Security Conference on Friday, the UK Foreign Office said in a statement. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:49:41 GMT NOFFWD7OVVIJHGFST65TBF3PEE https://www.reuters.com/world/uks-cameron-raises-red-sea- human-rights-issues-with-chinese-counterpart-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
Stress fracture rules bowler Jamieson out for prolonged spellFast bowler Kyle Jamieson has been ruled out for the rest of the season after scans revealed a stress fracture in his back, New Zealand Cricket announced on Saturday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:39:08 GMT IT6XALSMIZIBVDAXLNIR5LOCGQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/cricket/stress-fracture-rules-bowler-jamieson-out-prolonged-spell-2024-02-17/Reuters运动的蟋蟀
Eyeing China, senior US lawmaker vows to back funding for Pacific islandsThe Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:45:22 GMT LZC6UGA4OZJATBVUSNCCCWXHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/eyeing-china-senior-us-lawmaker-vows-back-funding-pacific-islands-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Italy watchdog forces TikTok to remove 'French scar' challenge videosItaly's communications authority AGCOM on Friday said it had forced social media app TikTok to remove some videos showing young people performing a dangerous practice known as the "French scar". Fri, 16 Feb 2024 17:41:20 GMT X22CYOCKOVNI5JMAR2FSWPKVHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-watchdog-forces-tiktok-remove-french-scar-challenge-videos-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Wars and elections complicate WTO deal-making ahead of Abu Dhabi meeting, says WTO chiefThe head of the World Trade Organization warned on Friday that it could be difficult to strike deals at a major ministerial meeting later this month given a spate of upcoming elections, recessions and wars in Ukraine and Gaza. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:06:57 GMT 5KWITMV4KVOZNNIOIEUFKJ2WQA https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/wars-elections-complicate-deal-making-ahead-abu-dhabi-meeting-wto-chief-2024-02-16/Reuters市场交易
China boosts Volkswagen's January deliveries, up 13%Volkswagen on Friday said group deliveries rose 13.3% in January to 698,200 vehicles, with China the leading growth region. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 12:32:19 GMT ZJQZKUBFNVOJBI7WS46YPLKKKE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/china-boosts-volkswagens-january-deliveries-up-13-2024-02-16/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Morning Bid: Global stocks at two-year highs, Nikkei skirts recordA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Fri, 16 Feb 2024 11:03:42 GMT SUA3ANLR2BI63POFTCENSJPM5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-16/Reuters市场
Taiwan agrees to bring in Indian migrant workers to ease job crunchTaiwan and India signed an agreement on Friday to bring in Indian migrant workers to the island as labour-strained Taipei seeks to expand its foreign workforce beyond its traditional source countries of Southeast Asia. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 10:32:12 GMT NNWOWYCDPFOJRBFZESNHTVI2FM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-agrees-bring-indian-migrant-workers-ease-job-crunch-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Exclusive: HSBC to improve ties with Hong Kong unit Hang Seng to mitigate riskHSBC plans to tighten risk management at Hong Kong unit Hang Seng Bank due to worries about a potential rise in bad loans amid growing economic headwinds and property sector crisis in China, said two people with knowledge of the matter. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 07:42:21 GMT 32XYCZ3GIZJO5IGHYLAIE3ZTYE https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/hsbc-improve-ties-with-hong-kong-unit-hang-seng-mitigate-risk-say-sources-2024-02-16/Sumeet Chatterjee, Engen Tham, Selena Li商业金融
China steps up 'whitelist' mechanism for property sector - mediaFive state-owned Chinese banks have been matched with more than 8,200 residential projects for development loans under the "whitelist" mechanism aimed at injecting liquidity into the crisis-hit sector, government-backed media The Paper reported. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:46:35 GMT 5MEW33CETNOULB4PGPSCX3VO5I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-steps-up-whitelist-mechanism-property-sector-media-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中国
India's small exporters reel as Red Sea crisis helps rivals nab businessAtul Jhunjhunwala, an exporter in the Indian eastern city of Kolkata, is tearing his hair out, having just lost another order due to the Red Sea crisis that has jacked up his shipping costs and times. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:35:32 GMT TU5PKCRKJJKDNJ2Z54GILSJPRA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indias-small-exporters-reel-red-sea-crisis-helps-rivals-nab-business-2024-02-16/Manoj Kumar, Mayank Bhardwaj世界印度
